biome.searchInPath.markdownDescription: Whether to search for the biome executable in the folders declared in the PATH environment variable

biome.lspBin.markdownDescription: The biome lsp server executable. If the path is relative, the workspace folder will be used as base path

biome_lsp.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

biome.rename.markdownDescription: Enable/Disable Biome handling renames in the workspace. (Experimental)

biome.enabled.description: Whether the Biome extension is enabled.
